alert.note: Alert for Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 5:39PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Indian River, southwestern Brevard and southeastern Osceola Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 539 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fellsmere to near Blue Cypress Lake to 6 miles north of Yeehaw Junction to 9 miles north of Kissimmee Prairie Preserve. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Lake Marian, Kenansville, and Blue Cypress Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Osceola
